Japan.visa: eVisa for Indian citizens up to 90 days. Apply online/offline prior to travel. Allows only single entry. Generally takes 5 working days to process.

Thailand.visa: Visa-free for Indian citizens upto 60 days. 6+ months validity on passport required. Before arrival, TDAC registration is mandatory.

USA.visa: Visa required before travel for 10 years. Fill DS-160 form online and schedule an appointment at the US Embassy before travel.
USA.customs: Follow local laws and security rules.
USA.insurance: Strongly recommended due to high medical costs.

UK.visa: Visa required before travel for 6 months. Apply for Standard Visitor visa online and attend biometric appointment at least 3 months prior to travel. Single or multiple entry allowed.
UK.vaccination: Routine vaccinations recommended. TB vaccination mandatory if staying longer than 6 months.
UK.customs: Queue politely and respect personal space.

France.visa: Schengen Visa for Indian citizens up to 90 days.
France.customs: Greet politely and respect local etiquette.

Germany.visa: Schengen Visa for Indian citizens up to 90 days.
Germany.customs: Be punctual and follow rules strictly.

Italy.visa: Schengen Visa for Indian citizens up to 90 days.

Singapore.visa: eVisa required before travel. Fill application Form 14A and SG Arrival Card online 3 days prior to travel.
Singapore.vaccination: No mandatory vaccinations required. Yellow fever vaccination mandatory if coming from an infected region.
Singapore.customs: Strict laws. Avoid littering and chewing gum.

UAE.visa: Visa on arrival for those Indian citizens who has visa of USA, Uk or EU. Otherwise eVisa required before travel.
UAE.customs: Dress modestly and respect local traditions.

Australia.visa: Visitor Visa required before travel. Apply online through ImmiAccount.
Australia.vaccination: Routine vaccinations recommended. Mandatory in cases staying longer than 6 months.
Australia.customs: Follow biosecurity and customs rules strictly.

Canada.visa: Visa required before travel upto 10 years. Apply online through the IRCC website.
Canada.customs: Be polite and respect local laws.

Malaysia.visa: Visa-free for Indian citizens. Fill MDAC form online 3 days prior to travel. Stay upto 30 days.
Malaysia.customs: Dress modestly and respect cultural norms.

Indonesia.visa: eVOA for Indian citizens. Valid for 30 days. Apply online prior to travel or on arrival.
Indonesia.vaccination: Routine vaccinations recommended. Yellow fever vaccination is mandatory if coming from an infected region.
Indonesia.customs: Dress modestly and respect local customs.

Nepal.visa: Visa free for Indian citizens. Voter ID or passport required.
